body.p: At this point, the HLM VM is up and running.
Use the following steps to create three controller nodes, two compute nodes, a DCN Node and a VRS-G nodes.

ol.li:
Deploy and configure the cloud services using the following command:hdeploy <cloudname>
You can run this command from anywhere. This process might approximatley three hours to install all seven nodes in a baremetal setup with LDAP enabled.

body.p: When this command completes successfully, there are three controller nodes, two compute nodes, one DCN Node and one VRS-G nodes deployed as shown in the networking topology.
